values: 浪漫；爱意；温馨；风流韵事；浪漫史；罗曼史；浪漫情调；传奇性；爱情；处于恋爱的感觉；恋爱故事；冒险故事；传奇；爱情故事；爱情小说；爱情电影
渲染；美化；夸大；夸张；与（某人）谈情说爱；追求；向…求爱；给予（某人）特别关注；讨好；奉承

synonym.mean: 传奇；浪漫史；风流韵事；冒险故事

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 浪漫主义者；浪漫主义艺术家
（英）有浪漫主义思想；（英）以浪漫方式进行（等于romanticize）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指篇幅较短，常包含一系列情节或事件，口述或书写成文的故事。
常可与story换用，指以事实为中心作叙述的故事，也指古代流传下来的传说故事或神话故事。
指部分或全部虚构的短篇、中篇、长篇小说，也指传奇故事，是小说的总称。
指短小而寓有教育意义的虚构故事。故事的主人公多为拟人化的动物或非动物之类。也作传说解。
系novel早期的代用词，泛指具有强烈神话和传奇色彩的故事，现指爱情故事。
指任何有情节、人物、对白，虚构的长篇散文体故事。

bilingual.target: 他们的爱情像旋风般迅速。
这部电影讲述了一段感人的恋情。
他们的恋情持续了很多年。

bilingual.source: She writes novels in the romance genre.
bilingual.target: 她写的小说属于浪漫类型。

bilingual.source: Her novel is full of romance and adventure.
bilingual.target: 她的小说中充满了恋情和冒险。

bilingual.source: This whirlwind romance caught her off guard.
bilingual.target: 这场扶摇般的爱情让她措手不及。

bilingual.source: The movie is a beautiful romance set in Paris.
bilingual.target: 这部电影是一部以巴黎为背景的美丽浪漫片。

bilingual.source: Their romance began during their college years.
bilingual.target: 他们的恋情始于大学时期。

bilingual.source: He feels very happy about his romance with her.
bilingual.target: 他对她的恋情感到非常幸福。

bilingual.source: The movie presents an idealized view of romance.
bilingual.target: 这部电影呈现了一个理想化的浪漫观。

list.abstract: Romance，即浪漫，音译为罗曼史。罗曼史是指欧洲在资产阶级革命以前的封建社会里流行的一种传奇文学。

Hey, hey, can you feel it, the way it sways you 　　The hum in your chest 　　You make my feet move, you turn my head loose 　　That's why I love you the best 　　Hey, you fill up the spaces, those empty places 　　The corners and cracks 　　You kill the sickness, my only witness 　　You're all that I have 　　Hands down we like, we like what we like 　　Hands down we like, we love, we choose you 　　We've got an eye, an eye for what's romance 　　We've got our eyes, our eyes trained on you 　　You watch us dance, we dance till we're dying 　　We dance to free ourselves from the room 　　We love the sound, the sound is what found us 　　Sound is the blood between me and you 　　Back when I had no story, nothing to form me 　　You got under my skin 　　You were my maker, my re-creator 　　My reason to live 　　Can't stop the bleeding or this leaving 　　Though I've tried 　　And when I return with those fresh bunch of burns 　　Your're waiting inside 　　Hey, you've got me crawling 　　You've got me spinning 　　Shake, shimmy shake 　　First you wreck me, then resurrect me, it's too much 　　Hands down we like, we like what we like 　　Hands down we like, we love, we choose you 　　We've got an eye, an eye for what's romance 　　We've got our eyes, our eyes trained on you 　　You watch us dance, we dance till we're dying 　　We dance to free ourselves from the room 　　We love the sound, the sound is what found us 　　Sound is the blood between me and you 　　Hands down we like, we like what we like 　　Hands down we like, we love, we choose you 　　We've got an ear, an ear for what's romance 　　We've got our ears, our ears trained on you 　　You watch us sing, we sing till we're crying 　　We sing to free ourselves from the room 　　We love the sound, the sound is what found us 　　Sound is the love between me and you

yingyinNormal.en: This place is really beautiful. Wah, romance ninja.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这家餐厅真是不错。浪漫忍者。

yingyinNormal.en: The most important part of any meaningful relationship is, A, romance. Yes, romance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一段有意义的关系中最重要的是A，浪漫。对，就是浪漫。

yingyinNormal.en: There he is. Belt, I want romance, drama, sincerity. Move me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他在那里，皮带猴，我要浪漫，戏剧，真诚。来感动我。

yingyinNormal.en: And not surprisingly, touch turns out to be crucial for romance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 以及，意料之中，触觉对爱情来说是很关键的。

yingyinNormal.en: What is that? By doing none of it, no dinner, no romance, no gifts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么办法？就是什么都不干，不吃什么晚餐，不要什么浪漫，不送任何礼物。

yingyinNormal.en: I like Tragic Vampire Romance Island. Fashion Island. Everyone shut up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我喜欢悲剧吸血鬼浪漫岛。时尚岛，你们都闭嘴。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you think? I don't know. What if living together kills the romance?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得呢？我也不知道。万一同住之后浪漫的火花就没了呢？

yingyinNormal.en: The nose's contribution to romance is more than noticing perfume or cologne.
yingyinNormal.zh: 鼻子对于爱情的贡献不只是注意到香水或古龙水而已。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the place where New Yorkers come to rest, romance, and express themselves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里是纽约民众休息、享受浪漫和表达自己的好地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, kind of takes the romance out of relationships. Kind of? It doesn't perfectly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不会让恋爱有点不浪漫吗？有点，是完全不浪漫，好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: You're always such a romantic. I am. I love romance. This triangle has to die right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你总是这么浪漫。是的，我喜欢浪漫。这种三角关系必须结束了。

yingyinNormal.en: So if the answer isn't romance, then what else you got? B, adventure. Yes, adventure. Break the rules.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那如果答案不是浪漫，还有什么选项呢？B，冒险。对，冒险，打破规则。

yingyinNormal.en: Shall we go to dinner? Hang on. As you know, I had planned a traditional evening of romance and gifts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们去吃饭吧。等一下，你知道，我原本计划了传统式的浪漫之夜，还有互赠礼物。

yingyinNormal.en: And you were worried about the romance. Wait. Why don't you guys stay across the hall, and we will live here?
yingyinNormal.zh: 同住怕不浪漫，吃屎就浪漫了吗？等等，那你们怎么不直接住去我家然后我跟莱纳德住这里？

yingyinNormal.en: A romance cover instead of a thriller. I could call it satire and sell it as my own. Originality must be protected.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给惊悚小说换个浪漫的封面，我可以说那是讽刺作品，自己卖钱，音乐的独创性必须被保护。

yingyinNormal.en: On the one hand, you can sugarcoat it, the way they do in movies and romance novels where beautiful people learn beautiful lessons where nothing is too messed up that can't be fixed with an apology and a Peter Gabriel song.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一种方式是，你可以美化它。就像电影和言情小说里一样，美丽的人物接受着美丽的考验，而那些考验都可以用一声抱歉和一首彼得·盖布瑞尔的歌解决。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 浪漫主义; 浪漫精神

word_family.mean: n. 浪漫；浪漫史；风流韵事；恋爱；爱情；恋情；恋爱关系；神秘感受；浪漫气氛；传奇气氛；传奇性；浪漫精神；中世纪传奇故事；骑士故事；浪漫曲；（Romance）罗曼语

examination_example.sentence: They are intrigued by the exotic <highlight>romance</highlight> in Danielle Steel's novels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们被Danielle Steel小说中的异国罗曼史迷住了。

examination_example.sentence: Passion is the drive that leads to <highlight>romance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 激情是通往爱情的动力。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Romance</highlight> is just impossible without mutual understanding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 爱情中少不了相互理解。

sense_info_list.zh: 浪漫气氛; 神秘感受

examination_example.sentence: For many of my peers, though, Venus quickly lost its <highlight>romance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但对许多我的同龄人来说，金星很快就失去了传奇色彩。

examination_example.sentence: It is a paradise of <highlight>romance</highlight> for alien life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它（金星）是外星生命的浪漫天堂。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It was a time when dreams came true and <highlight>romance</highlight> filled the sky.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那是一个梦想成真，浪漫弥漫天空的时代。

examination_example.sentence: My agent told me that my name Hazel sounded too much like a <highlight>romance</highlight>  (浪漫) novelist for older women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的经纪人告诉我，对于年长的女性来说，我的名字Hazel听起来太像浪漫小说家了。
